attributes.review: Let’s start by hour out took me 3 hours to load and I have perfectly good WiFi but it glitch out of nowhere with an old ugly orange person 🟠🤢absolutely disgusting I don’t know how people could look at that with such an admiration ✨I wanted to install this app for reasons to admire more to our lovely president Donald Trump🤩✨ but the fact that he made me put my personal information including my phone number like if he would ever call me which I would love him to call me ! But since I put my phone number I been getting random calls from people from other states and also text in the night and days.I think he sold my information to important people and I am absolutely impressed/upset our amazing president might be giving my information away😤.Also i would keep on kicking me from the app but I also just wanted to support and get this wonderful app more better since he made everything for us and absolutely no racism to many countries especially Hispanic ones saying we are rapist , drug dealers, and bringing crime but not just them also our wonderful people with dark skins not having their rights but Black lives matter!✨✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿 not only the white ones and it should be like Martin Luther king Jr. said about  “I have a dream” but he also achieve to take aways rights from the LGBTQ+ community 🏳️‍🌈💗 & our Chinese people like they didn’t bring that virus and our women’s he disrespects us !😤 we don’t deserve that we have our rights he also give hateful & horrible opinions and yes I said opinions not facts! I don’t know what to hate about him because there is a bunch more stuff than just that  but I know Gen Z will take over him !✨💞 thank you 4 all who read this but don’t get this app is a horrible app!😤
